headline: AIG’s Valuation in Focus After Profit Surge and Executive Shake-Up
summary: American International Group (AIG) has drawn attention following two developments: improved third-quarter earnings, including a swing to profit over nine months, and the unexpected decision by the incoming President not to join the company. See our latest analysis for American International Group. After a year defined by a swing back into profitability and strategic leadership shifts, American International Group has seen solid momentum in its total shareholder return, notching a 4.84% gain...
